citeinfo.origin: Russian Acadamy of Science, Far East Branch, Institute of Marine Biology
citeinfo.title: New Data on the Biology of the Smooth Tongue, Leuroglossus schmidti (Bathylagidae), in the Northwestern Pacific

descript.abstract: New data are given on the vertical distribution, reproduction and spawning periods of the smooth tongue, the dispersal of its eggs, larvae, and fry in the Pacific waters of Kamchatka and the western Bering Sea.
descript.purpose: To report on the new data on the biology of the smooth tongue, Leuroglossus schmidti (Bathylagidae), in the northwestern Pacific

cntaddr.address: Inst. Mar. Biol., Russ. Acad. Sci.
Inst. Mar. Biol., Russ. Acad. Sci.
